009package imagingbook.common.geometry.moments;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
013
014//TODO: make more efficient versions!
015
016/**
017 * This class defines static methods for moment calculations on 2D point sets.
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 *
021 */
022public abstract class Moments2D {
023        
024        private Moments2D() {}
025        
026        public static double ordinaryMoment(Iterable<Pnt2d> R, int p, int q) {
027                double mpq = 0.0;
028                if (p == 0 && q == 0) { // just count the number of points
029                        for (@SuppressWarnings("unused") Pnt2d pnt : R) {
030                                mpq += 1;
031                        }
032                }
033                else {
034                        for (Pnt2d pnt : R) {
035                                mpq += Math.pow(pnt.getX(), p) * Math.pow(pnt.getY(), q);
036                        }
037                }
038                return mpq;
039        }
040
041        public static double centralMoment(Iterable<Pnt2d> R, int p, int q) {
042                double m00 = ordinaryMoment(R, 0, 0); // region area
043                if (Arithmetic.isZero(m00)) {
044                        throw new RuntimeException("empty point set");
045                }
046                double xc = ordinaryMoment(R, 1, 0) / m00;
047                double yc = ordinaryMoment(R, 0, 1) / m00;
048                double mupq = 0.0;
049                for (Pnt2d pnt : R) {
050                        mupq += Math.pow(pnt.getX() - xc, p) * Math.pow(pnt.getY() - yc, q);
051                }
052                return mupq;
053        }
054
055        public static double normalizedCentralMoment(Iterable<Pnt2d> R, int p, int q) {
056                double m00 = ordinaryMoment(R, 0, 0);
057                double scale = 1.0 / Math.pow(m00, 0.5 * (p + q) + 1);
058                return centralMoment(R, p, q) * scale;
059        }
060
061
062//      public static void main(String[] args) {
063//
064//              List<Pnt2d> points = Arrays.asList(
065//                              Pnt2d.from(10, 15), 
066//                              Pnt2d.from(3, 7), 
067//                              Pnt2d.from(-1, 5), 
068//                              Pnt2d.from(-1, 5));
069//
070//              System.out.println("Ordinary moments:");
071//              System.out.println("m00 = " + ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 0));
072//              System.out.println("m10 = " + ordinaryMoment(points, 1, 0));
073//              System.out.println("m01 = " + ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 1));
074//              System.out.println("m11 = " + ordinaryMoment(points, 1, 1));
075//              System.out.println("m20 = " + ordinaryMoment(points, 2, 0));
076//              System.out.println("m02 = " + ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 2));
077//
078//              double a = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 0);
079//              System.out.println("a = " + a);
080//              System.out.println("xc = " + (ordinaryMoment(points, 1, 0) / a));
081//              System.out.println("yc = " + (ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 1) / a));       
082//
083//              System.out.println("Central moments:");
084//              System.out.println("mu10 = " + centralMoment(points, 1, 0));
085//              System.out.println("mu01 = " + centralMoment(points, 0, 1));
086//              System.out.println("mu11 = " + centralMoment(points, 1, 1));
087//              System.out.println("mu20 = " + centralMoment(points, 2, 0));
088//              System.out.println("mu02 = " + centralMoment(points, 0, 2));
089//
090//              System.out.println("Normalized central moments:");
091//              System.out.println("nu10 = " + normalizedCentralMoment(points, 1, 0));
092//              System.out.println("nu01 = " + normalizedCentralMoment(points, 0, 1));
093//              System.out.println("nu11 = " + normalizedCentralMoment(points, 1, 1));
094//              System.out.println("nu20 = " + normalizedCentralMoment(points, 2, 0));
095//              System.out.println("nu02 = " + normalizedCentralMoment(points, 0, 2));
096//      }
097
098}
099
100/*
101Ordinary moments:
102m00 = 4.0
103m10 = 11.0
104m01 = 32.0
105m11 = 161.0
106m20 = 111.0
107m02 = 324.0
108a = 4.0
109xc = 2.75
110yc = 8.0
111Central moments:
112mu10 = 0.0
113mu01 = 0.0
114mu11 = 73.0
115mu20 = 80.75
116mu02 = 68.0
117Normalized central moments:
118nu10 = 0.0
119nu01 = 0.0
120nu11 = 4.5625
121nu20 = 5.046875
122nu02 = 4.25
123 */
